1.title: Risk of Falling in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: A discussion about the need to assess for fall risk and to target modifiable underlying risk factors for falling in older age.

2.title: Improving Balance in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: A discussion about ways in which to improve older adults' balance, which could in turn reduce the risk of falling, a leading cause of injury in older age.

3.title: Exercise Demonstration to Improve Older Adults' Balance

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Simple exercises for fall prevention and for the optimization of seniors' gait ability and balance.

4.title: Benefits of Tai Chi in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A discussion about ways in which practicing Tai Chi can increase strength and improve balance to help older adults minimize their risk of falling.

5.title: Tai Chi Demonstration with Dr. Luciana

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: A demonstration of simple Tai Chi exercises for the optimization of balance and stability.

6.title: Self-image, Safety, and Fear of Falling in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A discussion about ways in which to decrease older adults' fear of falling while optimizing their walking experience.

7.title: Safety Issues Related to Walking in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: A discussion about the need to target modifiable underlying risk factors for falling in older age related to walking.

8.title: Issues Preventing Older Adults from Engaging in Water Exercises

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A discussion about ways in which participating in water exercises can help older adults minimize their risk of falling.

9.title: Aligning the Body to Minimize Falling in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: A discussion about the importance of improving the alignment of the spine to potentially reduce the risk of falling in older age.

10.title: The Importance of Sacrum and Hips' Balance

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: A discussion about the importance of improving the alignment of the hips and sacrum areas to potentially reduce the risk of falling in older age.

11.title: Chiropratic Options for Older Adults

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: A discussion about ways in which seeing a skilled chiropractor could help older adults minimize their risk of falling.

12.title: The Cost of Chiropractic Care in Older Age

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: A discussion about the need to locate a skilled chiropractor who accepts health insurance programs to help older adults minimize their risk of falling.

13.title: Different Types of Falls

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: A discussion about the different ways in which older adults typically fall and how to minimize their risk of falling.

14.title: Stability Demonstration with Dr. Luciana

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: A demonstration of simple exercises for the optimization of stability.

15.title: Balance Demonstration with Dr. Luciana

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: A demonstration of simple exercises for the optimization of balance.

16.title: Demonstration on Minimizing Fall-related Injuries with Dr. Luciana

episode of.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: A demonstration of simple exercises for the minimization of injuries stemming from falling in older age.

imdb.plot outline: This talk show with Dr. Luciana aka Luciana Lagana combines informational material with a light-hearted yet respectful approach to a serious topic: preventing and minimizing falling in older age. Guest speakers include experts in chiropractic, kinesiology, and martial arts techniques, who offer useful information and engage in fun exercises that often have Dr. Luciana struggle to keep up with them.
imdb.title: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling
akas: Dr. Luciana Show: Aging and Falling (United States)
